docs.title: What ⚡
docs.text: A configuration for MKDocs that makes it work with Obsidian effectively

docs.title: Why 🤷‍♂️
docs.text: The default config for MKDocs isn't great for inclusion in an Obsidian vault.

docs.title: ✅SameDir Plugin
docs.text: Allows for markdown docs to live in the root directory instead of "/docs/"

docs.title: ✅ Moves config files to .mkdocs directory
docs.text: Moves all config files to a hidden .mkdocs directory so not visible in Obsidian

docs.title: ✅Converts WikiLinks
docs.text: Uses the RoamLinks plugin to standard markdown links

docs.title: ✅ Logo and Facvicon
docs.text: Adds Obsidian logo and favicon for fun!

docs.title: ✅ Custom CSS
docs.text: Adds a custom.css file that changes the header background to match Obsidian default dark theme
